attributes.action: Maths is not obligatory for a-level
attributes.additional_details: Adding on to that, students already know what their abilities for different subjects are. The government should not consider this announcement made by the Prime Minister as this will cause people to reconsider what they want to do in the future to something that will not fulfill their needs and what they are best at. Every person has a reason to do well in a subject that they KNOW they are good at, it is a basic human right to do so.
